title: Park Hyatt Paradise in the Maldives with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinners & Return Transfers
description: Experience tropical barefoot luxury at its finest with a private pool villa stay at the iconic Park Hyatt Maldives Hadahaa. Featuring just 50 villas on site, this intimate resort whisks you away from reality and straight into paradise, with an on-site spa, two pools (including a freshwater pool overlooking the ocean), three restaurants and a bar. Included in your Maldivian escape is daily à la carte breakfast and nightly three-course dinner at The Dining Room, plus one themed dinner at The Island Grill, the resort’s signature barefoot restaurant, serving fresh seafood and prime cuts of meat. Plus, enjoy a complimentary domestic flight from Male to Hadahaa, including a boat transfer to the Park Hyatt - all part of the exotic Maldives experience.
offer_address: Gaafu Alifu Atoll, Hadahaa, North Huvadhoo 20054, Maldives

title: Pristine Maldives Private Island Villas with Three Restaurants & Onsite Spa
description:
Experience luxury over the lagoon in the Maldives’ deepest atoll - the ‘Living Island’ of Hadahaa. Comprising just 51 villas across a private tropical island, this five-star resort whisks you away from reality and straight into picture-perfect paradise.

Harness the holistic healing powers of The Vidhun Spa with a tension-melting massage, take a dip in one of the resort’s two freshwater pools, or sample culinary excellence at one of three on-site restaurants, including the overwater Koi at the Drift.
offer_address: Gaafu Alifu Atoll, Hadahaa, North Huvadhoo, 20054, Maldives
